title: President Donald J. Trump and German Chancellor Angela Merkel Strengthen the Close Relationship Between the United States and Germany – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
April 27, 2018
The close friendship between America and Germany is built on our shared values. … It is the foundation of a very, very hopeful future.
						President Donald J. Trump					A CLOSE AND HISTORIC RELATIONSHIP: The relationship between the German people and the United States predates America’s independence and extends to the deep bond the two countries share today.COOPERATION ON JOBS AND TRADE: The United States and Germany have a deep trade and investment relationship, and the President and Chancellor Merkel have worked to enhance economic cooperation through collaboration on apprenticeships and women’s financial empowerment.A PARTNER ON INTERNATIONAL SECURITY AND COUNTERTERRORISM: Germany has been a valuable partner to the United States in the fight to eliminate ISIS and counter foreign threats.
